water_bottle.name: Flask of Water
water_bottle.flavour_text: A metal flask filled with fresh water.

water_gallon.name: Gallon of Water
water_gallon.flavour_text: An old plastic gallon jug, filled with fresh water.

water_keg.name: Keg of Water
water_keg.flavour_text: A metal keg which once held alcohol, but now holds fresh water.

water_drum.name: Water Drum
water_drum.flavour_text: A large oil drum, cleaned out and filled with fresh water.

bits_bolts.name: Bits and Bolts
bits_bolts.flavour_text: A small assortment of metal parts.

discarded_parts.name: Discarded Parts
discarded_parts.flavour_text: Small components of what might have once been a large machine.

choice_components.name: Choice Components
choice_components.flavour_text: Microcontrollers, solenoid valves, plastic tubing and other things that are either hard to find or almost impossible to build from scratch.

scrap_pile.name: Pile of Scrap
scrap_pile.flavour_text: A big pile of sheet metal, reusable parts, and strange gadgets.

small_battery.name: Small Battery
small_battery.flavour_text: A small battery that contains a minuscule amount of energy.

power_pack.name: Power Pack
power_pack.flavour_text: A large, portable battery that carries a decent amount of energy.

fuel_cell.name: Fuel Cell
fuel_cell.flavour_text: A metallic cyllinder that radiates a violet glow. Safe, unless you spend a lot of time near it. Contains a great amount of energy.

fuel_array.name: Pile of Scrap
fuel_array.flavour_text: Many fuel cells working in tandem. Much of the energy contained within is dispersed into the air, but the benefits far outweigh the downsides. Your only reliable way of manually transporting massive amounts of energy across the wasteland.

unknown_seed.name: Unknown Seed
unknown_seed.flavour_text: An intact seed from an unknown plant. Full of potential.

saplings.name: Saplings in Dirt
saplings.flavour_text: A chunk of dirt with numerous little saplings growing from it. This is life, and must be properly nurtured to grow even more.

seed_bag.name: Bag of Seeds
seed_bag.flavour_text: This is from before the war. The seeds inside are dried up, but maybe with some water and soil, you could make something happen.

berry_bush.name: Berry Bush
berry_bush.flavour_text: A bright green bush with many vibrant, and sadly inedible, red berries growing from it.
